overview: A german bottle of beer, washed up on the shore of an almost inaccessible Lofoten island in the Arctic Ocean. Where did it come from? Did it really travel all the way up from Germany?  Back in his hometown, Dresden, filmmaker Steffen Krones canâ€™t get this incidence out of his mind. Is Dresden, by any chance, connected to the Arctic circle via its waterways?
title: The North Drift
